description:
The last (but not least!) of http://anidb.net/ch39363 [Hajime]`s trio of best friends. With his outrageous antics and unmistakable looks, Jirou definitely knows how to stand out in a crowd. In fact, he`s earned a reputation as something of a troublemaker...
Jirou loves commotion, and with all the recent ruckus over aliens, he`s made sure to keep up to date on every little event. After all, history is being made - and as the years go by and the stories become legend, he wants to be able to say he was there to see it all happen!
Source: shingu.rightstuf.com
name: Narita Jirou
